name: Halloweenie Roast
description:
Halloweenie Roast is a party 2D brawler. Up to four players fight against one another attempting to sacrifice each other to their gods and be the one to finally appease them.

Laugh at your friends as you sacrifice one of six different Weenies.

Grab your friends and have fun!

The game can be played on a computer using either a single keyboard or four Xbox controllers.
